name: Enchanted Forest
overview: The age of goblins, elves and demons is drawing to a close. Magic is no longer allowed. Elves and spirits have mad mischief for long enough, perpetrating viscous attacks and evil deeds. It is time to stop them, and it is up to you to do so. The creatures are holed up in the Enchanged forest. Your job is to clear the are of them, and make the world safe for mortals. Enchanted Forest - a game of adventure...and magic.
